long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Chrome Browser Extension for HorseraceBase.com – your ultimate companion for in-depth horse racing analysis! Elevate your racing experience with our latest version, meticulously crafted to enhance the Collateral Form Tool page on HorseraceBase.com.

Key Features:

Table Formatting Mastery: Our extension takes your race analysis to the next level by fine-tuning the table layout on the Collateral Form Tool page. Enjoy a cleaner, more organized display, allowing you to focus on the crucial details that matter most.

Horse Pound Values: Uncover the power of precision with added horse pound values. Now, the Collateral Form Tool provides even more comprehensive insights into each horse's performance, empowering you to make informed decisions based on weight, finishing position, and more.

Direct Head-to-Head Analysis: Dive into the heart of competition with direct head-to-head comparisons. Witness the thrilling showdowns between horses, complete with finishing positions, weights, and distances beaten on the day. This dynamic feature delivers a deeper understanding of each contender's strengths and weaknesses.

Strategic Exclusions: Stay ahead of the game with our smart exclusion system. Races used for head-to-head analysis are seamlessly excluded from the Collateral Form, ensuring a clean and focused view for your meticulous scrutiny.

Unleash the potential of your HorseraceBase.com experience with our Chrome Browser Extension. Whether you're a seasoned punter or a passionate racing enthusiast, our tool is designed to empower your decision-making process. Elevate your race analysis today – precision, strategy, and excitement await!
